Uses of Package
application

  • Classes in application used by application 
    Class and Description
    AABB
    An Axis Aligned Bounding Box (AABB) used for collision detection.
    Camera
    A class for storing camera position and rotation and adjusting it.
    Config
    Simple storage class for storing information about a configuration
    ConfigCreatorSim
    An extension of MainSimulation with some extra functionality used by the config creator
    ConfigSimulation
    An extension of PhysicsSimulation that includes some extra functionality used in config editor.
    CustomObject
    A custom format for objects.
    FPSSystem
    An fps system for use with OpenGL applications.
    MainApp
    The main application that is executed.
    MainSimulation
    The class that starts the physics simulation and reads configs for it.
    Material
    Used for storing information about the material of an object
    ObjectInit
    A data structure for storing information needed to initialise objects
    PhysicsSimulation
    A class for running a physics simulation on a set of objects given certain starting parameters.
    Position
    Stores a position in 3d space.
    Renderer
    Custom renderer for displaying objects of the type CustomObject to the screen in 3d using OpenGL.
    Rotation
    Stores a rotation in 3d space, made up of an X, Y, and Z axis rotation
    TriangularFace
    Stores information about a triangular face (3 vertices)
    Vertex
    A class for representing a vertex and its associated normal.
